column2: Enable per-file trim-trailing-whitespace and ensure-final-newline settings

column3: This change will allow per-file overriding of settings handled by the TrailingSpacesStripper class. The specific motivation for this is to support the editorconfig-jetbrains plugin. For an example of how this extension to TrailingSpacesStripper can be used, see the EditorSettingsManager class in the "future" branch of the editorconfig plugin.

I'm not sure if the TrailingSpacesStripper class is the best place to keep the new UserData keys and string constants that I introduced, so please feel free to change where those live and I will update accordingly.

Also, I have done some basic testing to make sure that this patch works well with my plugin, but I am having some issues running the IntelliJ test suite. I have been in contact with one of your developers about this patch, so I will work with her to make sure that the patch doesn't introduce any regressions and that my new tests work okay. I just wanted to go ahead and get the pull request out.
Added support for per-file trailing spaces and final newline settings
